descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][b]Here is all you need to know[/b]
Name: Rafe
Red pelt for easy distinction
HP: 100 (increase with level)
Damage: 20
Levels with you from 1 to 255
Not overpowered 
Doesn't affect stealth meter
Have Light foot perk
Carry Items
Look Cool
Wait for you in [color=#ff0000]Riverwood[/color]

[b]Requirements [/b]
Skyrim 1.9

[b]Bugs[/b]
[/font]If Rafe doesn`t Apear, change the load order [font=Arial]
[/font]For some reason if he not respond to your commands Save and reload [font=Arial]

[color=#f4f4f4][b]Recomended mod:[/b][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32089/?]Silent Wolf Followers [/url]< MUST HAVE

[b]Check my other mods!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5547206/?tb=mods&pUp=1]List of my mods click here!! <[/url][/b]

Enjoy and [color=#e69138][b][u]Endorse[/u][/b][/color] !
author: Ramonfg95
